summary:
The Certified Network Defender program offered by the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security at Bar-Ilan University is a comprehensive training course designed to prepare students for careers in cyber security and cloud architecture. The program is aligned with international certification standards, including EC-Council, AWS, Cisco, Fortinet, and Check Point. It provides hands-on training in secure architecture design, network defense, and cloud solutions, with a focus on practical skills and industry-relevant knowledge.

The course includes six prestigious international certifications: LPIC-1 Linux Administrator, CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate), CCSA (Check Point Certified Security Administrator), NSE 4 (Fortinet Network Security Expert), AWS Cloud Practitioner, and AWS Solutions Architect Associate. Students will gain expertise in areas such as virtualization, Windows and Linux server management, network configuration, and cloud security.

The program emphasizes practical learning through virtual lab environments, project-based assignments, and workshops on LinkedIn branding and presentation skills. Students will also have access to advanced cloud-based exam preparation platforms to simulate real-world scenarios and improve their performance in international certification exams.

The course spans approximately 10 months, with classes held twice a week. Upon successful completion, students will receive three prestigious certificates from Bar-Ilan University and will be well-prepared for roles in the global cyber security and cloud industries. Additional benefits include access to original content from leading manufacturers, significant discounts on certification exams, and personal guidance in professional branding and career development.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Certified Network Defender and AWS Cloud Architect Training Program

COURSE OVERVIEW: This program, offered by the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security at Bar-Ilan University, is designed to train participants in advanced cybersecurity and cloud architecture. The course prepares students for six prestigious international certifications and provides hands-on experience with real-world scenarios. The dual specialization in cybersecurity and cloud increases employment opportunities for graduates. The program includes workshops on personal branding, presentation skills, and project development to enhance employability.

TARGET AUDIENCE: Not explicitly mentioned.

COURSE LEADERSHIP:
- Program Director: Mr. Eran Shaham, with over 30 years of experience in cybersecurity training and management. He has led training centers for major companies like Check Point, VMware, and Amazon AWS.
- Professional Advisors: Mr. Hillel Koberovsky and Mr. Ilya Levin.
  - Mr. Hillel Koberovsky: A strategic consultant and technological mentor with 19 years of experience in cybersecurity training and innovation. He is a certified instructor for Check Point, Fortinet, and Cisco.
  - Mr. Ilya Levin: A cloud technologies and security expert with 8 years of experience. He is a certified AWS and ISC2 instructor.

PREREQUISITES:
- Admission interview with academic advisors.
- Basic internet user skills.
- Ability to read and understand technical English.

CERTIFICATIONS: LPIC-1 Linux Administrator, CCNA (Cisco Certified Network Associate), CCSA (Check Point Certified Security Administrator), NSE 4 (Fortinet Network Security Expert), AWS Cloud Practitioner, AWS Solutions Architect Associate.

COURSE SCHEDULE:
- Start Date: December 31, 2024.
- Duration: Approximately 10 months.
- Schedule: Tuesdays (17:30–21:30) and Fridays (09:00–13:00).
- Academic Hours: 400 hours of frontal instruction.

LEARNING FORMAT:
- Location: School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University Campus, Ramat Gan.
- Hybrid learning: Some classes may be conducted via Zoom, depending on university and national guidelines.
- Practical labs: Students will work on virtual lab environments simulating real-world scenarios.

TUITION AND FEES:
- Registration Fee: 480₪.
- Tuition Fee: 19,800₪.
- Certification exams: External and require additional payment.
- Benefits: Free VMware Workstation and significant discounts on international exams.

COURSE TOPICS:
1. Certified Network Defender (CND):
   - Introduction to cybersecurity concepts and terminology.
   - Network communication basics, TCP/IP protocol, and network defense planning.
   - LinkedIn workshop for personal branding and job search.
   - Presentation skills workshop for effective communication and project presentation.

2. Windows Server 2022 and Active Directory:
   - Virtualization basics and VMware Workstation setup.
   - Installation and configuration of Windows 10/11 and Windows Server 2022.
   - Active Directory management, DNS, DHCP, and Group Policy implementation.

3. Linux Administration (LPIC-1):
   - Linux installation, configuration, and security.
   - Command-line operations, scripting, and network security principles.

4. Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA):
   - Network components, topology, and security.
   - IPv4/IPv6 configuration, VLANs, NAT, and VPNs.
   - Wireless security and REST-based APIs.

5. Check Point Certified Security Administrator (CCSA):
   - Firewall installation and management.
   - Security policy management, VPN configuration, and incident response.

6. Fortinet Network Security Expert (NSE4):
   - Firewall policies, NAT, web filtering, and intrusion prevention.
   - SSL VPN and IPsec VPN configuration.

7. AWS Cloud Practitioner:
   - AWS Cloud architecture and security.
   - Key AWS services and compliance aspects.

8. AWS Solutions Architect Associate:
   - Advanced cloud architecture design.
   - Elasticity, high availability, and disaster recovery.
   - Microservices and serverless architectures.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION:
- Contact Person: Esther Asulin.
- Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.
- Phone: *9392 (Information Center), 03-5318254 (Main Office).

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION:
- Bar-Ilan University, School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security.
- Official Partners: EC-Council, Fortinet, Cisco, AWS.
- Website: hitech-school.biu.ac.il.

ADDITIONAL NOTES:
- Attendance Requirement: 80% of sessions and completion of assignments.
- Certificates: Three certificates awarded by Bar-Ilan University upon successful completion.
- Program Changes: Subject to enrollment numbers and university policies.
- Registration Process: Managed by Eran Shaham Ltd. for Bar-Ilan University.

This comprehensive program equips students with the skills and certifications needed to excel in the fields of cybersecurity and cloud architecture, supported by experienced instructors and cutting-edge resources.
